s: March 13, 2020 - So on one hand, the Organic Chix ordeal is unique because of the product it was selling — hand sanitizer — during a once-in-a-generation health crisis that has Amazon scrambling to police against everything from false guarantees on face masks to price gouging on Purell.

t: Amazon restricts sales of face masks and hand sanitizer due to coronavirus price gouging | The Verge
s: March 11, 2020 - Amazon has begun restricting the types of sellers on its third-party Marketplace platform that can sell face masks, hand sanitizer and other health products. The decision, revealed in a note sent to sellers on Wednesday and reviewed by The Verge, is a notable escalation in Amazon’s fight ...
